channel.title: SEAN'S FOOD BLOG!!
channel.description: Recent content on SEAN'S FOOD BLOG!!

item.title: The Shop Kitchen
item.description: Test review for The Shop WIWI formula: WIWI = 0.5(Taste) + 0.35(Value) + 0.15(Service & Atmosphere) WIWI: 7.55 Taste: 9/10 Value: 5.5 (up to 7*)/10 Service and Atmosphere: 7.5/10 As of March 21, 2018 The Shop offers a Groupon where you get $7 off a purchase of $20 - bumps the value up to 7! What we ordered The “French Melt” menu description: “Sticky, but worth it. Grilled french toast sandwich, seared ham, cheddar, and topped with real maple syrup”

item.title: Why I Made This Site
item.description: Two simple reasons: I wanted to learn how to make a website using R blogdown. I wanted to make it fun for myself, so I wanted to do something I was really passionate about… and God knows I LOVE to eat! So I’m developing a unique set of metrics for evaluating the places I eat, anywhere in the world I may be. The details of how I assess each restuarant are described in another post.
